tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: The bottom of the black box moves.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Using the symbols at the bottom of the black box, solve the words under the UFO models.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: The word under the first model is oxygen.

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: You need three UFO models as in photos.

tips.name: Tip 5
tips.text: Three words you need are space, nucleus, tail. What unites them?

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is COMET. Take films with letters COMET and attach to the envelope #2.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Peel off the sticker from the bottom of the black box.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Use moveable bottom of the box. You can see a letter in its hole.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: The bottom can be inserted in four different directions.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is LUXE. Take films with the letters LUXE and attach to the envelope #3.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Put the three correct parts of the identikit on a sheet on the board then look around the edge.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is PORTAL.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: On the badge reverse side you can see the word stretched vertically.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is MIX.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Move the UFO film vertically at the landing site to read the letters.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is DWARF.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Place eight screws with the appropriate cap size onto the UFO part. The lines that connect the screws form a shape.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is STAR.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Attach the mirror to the dark lines in the photo with crop circles to see five letters.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is WHITE.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Follow the route of red threads and collect the word.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is PROXIMA. Take films with the letters PROXIMA and attach to the envelope #4.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Align the black helm with the similar drawing on the box lid.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Turn the helm in accordance with the instructions in the task. Get a seven-letter word.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is NETWORK.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: You need a panel with dials on the box lid.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Draw the clock hands on the dial in accordance with the time given in the instructions.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is UNIT.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Attach the fragments of the radar to the appropriate places on the dashboard.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: The same fragments are used several times.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: Determine the names of the obtained constellations using the map of the starry sky.

tips.name: Tip 4
tips.text: Locate the symbols that correspond to the names of the constellations on the dashboard.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is FAIL.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Attach films with the words you received to the corresponding facets of the black box.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The code from the black box is one six nine.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: Search the contents of the ball.

tips.name: Tip 2
tips.text: Insert the screws into the appropriate holes in the black box lid.

tips.name: Tip 3
tips.text: You only need to consider the symbols that correspond to screws with nuts.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is JOIN. Take films with the letters JOIN and attach to the envelope #6.

tips.name: Tip 1
tips.text: The fingers of an alien on each screen press a button on the keyboard.

tips.name: Answer
tips.text: The answer is LIFE.
